otherNames: Xijing Sushe, Roommates, 戏精宿舍
synopsis: Bai Junyan, a neighbor's white lotus with the fragrance of tea; Luo Ben, a flower of wealth in the world with eyes higher than the top. The two drama queens were assigned to the same dormitory and joined the same drama club. In front of them, there appeared the sophomore drama club senior and iceberg male god Gao Shu, and his mysterious roommate Ouyang who is highly socially afraid... At this point, the actors on the stage have gathered. Will they take off their masks and be honest? treat each other; or will they each show their special powers and create a campus drama of intrigue?
